item.title: Linked Stories About Connection at the End of the World
item.description: If you've never read linked short stories or think you won't like them, give this book about our impact and connection in dark times a try.

item.title: “Pizza Parties Don’t Fix Burnout”: The State of Librarian Mental Health
item.description: Library workers are feeling increased pressures to be everything to everyone, and the impact on their mental health matters.

item.title: Cool, Calm, and Collected: 5 Exciting Upcoming SFF Story Anthologies
item.description: These are just some of the SFF short stories to look forward to this year. What collections are you looking forward to in 2026?

item.title: 6 of the Best New Book Releases Out January 20, 2025
item.description: We already know Jennette McCurdy's latest is going to be a hit, but there's also Black Queer US History, a South Korean chosen family, & more
